question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 13, 8PM ET
description:

question: Ningbo Open: Emma Raducanu vs Lin Zhu
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Emma Raducanu and Lin Zhu in the Ningbo Open, scheduled for October 12 at 10:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Raducanu' if Emma Raducanu advances against Lin Zhu.

This market will resolve to 'Zhu' if Lin Zhu advances against Emma Raducanu.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: XRP Up or Down - October 14, 12AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the XRP/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Over" if Girona and Real Oviedo combine to score 3 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 3, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50–50.

If the game is started but not completed, this market will resolve according to the official final score published on laliga.com. This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Dodgers vs. Brewers
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for October 13 at 8:08PM ET:
If the Los Angeles Dodgers win, the market will resolve to “Dodgers”.
If the Milwaukee Brewers win, the market will resolve to “Brewers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Ningbo Open: Yue Yuan vs Xinyu Wang
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Yue Yuan and Xinyu Wang in the Ningbo Open, scheduled for October 12 at 10:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Yuan' if Yue Yuan advances against Xinyu Wang.

This market will resolve to 'Wang' if Xinyu Wang advances against Yue Yuan.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Japan Women's Open, Qualification: Caty McNally vs Joanna Garland
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Caty McNally and Joanna Garland in the Japan Women's Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 12 at 9:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'McNally' if Caty McNally advances against Joanna Garland.

This market will resolve to 'Garland' if Joanna Garland advances against Caty McNally.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: 49ers vs. Buccaneers: O/U 46.5
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for October 12 at 4:25 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the 49ers and Buccaneers combine to score 47 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 47, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: 49ers vs. Buccaneers
events.description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for October 12 at 4:25PM ET:
If the San Francisco 49ers win, the market will resolve to “49ers”.
If the Tampa Bay Buccaneers win, the market will resolve to “Buccaneers”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will Bitcoin hit $100k or $120k first?
description:
This market will resolve to the lower price in the title if Bitcoin’s price dips to that level or below before it hits the higher title price between October 12, 2025 at 10:00 AM ET and December 31, 2025 at 11:59 PM ET. It will resolve to the higher price in the title if Bitcoin’s price first reaches that level or above before it dips to the lower title price during the same period.

If neither price level is reached within the market timeframe, the market will resolve 50–50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "High" and "Low" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Will Zcash flip Monero by December 31?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Zcash's Market Cap exceeds Monero’s at any point by December 31, 2025 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, the market will resolve to “No”.

This market will resolve based on CoinGecko's "historical data" section for each coin, currently available at https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/zcash/historical_data and https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/monero/historical_data respectively, specifically the daily "Market Cap" data.

The daily market cap data for any given date will be considered finalized once data for the following calendar day is published on CoinGecko’s “Historical Data” page for both Zcash and Monero.

This market will resolve based on the specified CoinGecko data, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: European Open, Qualification: Nikoloz Basilashvili vs Pierre-Hugues Herbert
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Nikoloz Basilashvili and Pierre-Hugues Herbert in the European Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 13 at 5:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Basilashvili' if Nikoloz Basilashvili advances against Pierre-Hugues Herbert.

This market will resolve to 'Herbert' if Pierre-Hugues Herbert advances against Nikoloz Basilashvili.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Ethereum Up or Down - October 14, 12PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the ETH/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Ethereum Up or Down on October 14?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT Oct 13 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Oct 14 '25 12:00 ET candle.

question: Japan Women's Open: Katie Boulter vs Linda Noskova
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Katie Boulter and Linda Noskova in the Japan Women's Open, scheduled for October 13 at 3:00AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Boulter' if Katie Boulter advances against Linda Noskova.

This market will resolve to 'Noskova' if Linda Noskova advances against Katie Boulter.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Ningbo Open: Aliaksandra Sasnovich vs Zeynep Sonmez
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Aliaksandra Sasnovich and Zeynep Sonmez in the Ningbo Open, scheduled for October 13 at 5:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Sasnovich' if Aliaksandra Sasnovich advances against Zeynep Sonmez.

This market will resolve to 'Sonmez' if Zeynep Sonmez advances against Aliaksandra Sasnovich.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) on the date specified in the title has a final “Close” price higher than the price specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

Price precision is determined by the number of decimal places in the source.

question: Japan Women's Open: Elise Mertens vs Cristina Bucsa
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Elise Mertens and Cristina Bucsa in the Japan Women's Open, scheduled for October 13 at 9:00PM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Mertens' if Elise Mertens advances against Cristina Bucsa.

This market will resolve to 'Bucsa' if Cristina Bucsa advances against Elise Mertens.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the WTA Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Chargers vs. Dolphins: O/U 45.5
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for October 12 at 1:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Chargers and Dolphins combine to score 46 or more points in this game.

If the combined total is less than 46, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: Spread: Commanders (-5.5)
description:
In the upcoming NFL game, scheduled for October 13 at 8:15 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Commanders" if the Commanders win the game by 6 or more points.

Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Bears".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Bears vs. Commanders
events.description:

In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for October 13 at 8:30 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Utah and Blackhawks combine to score 7 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 7, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

question: European Open, Qualification: Tibo Colson vs Yannick Hanfmann
description:
This is a polymarket on the tennis match between Tibo Colson and Yannick Hanfmann in the European Open, Qualification, scheduled for October 13 at 6:30AM ET.

This market will resolve to 'Colson' if Tibo Colson advances against Yannick Hanfmann.

This market will resolve to 'Hanfmann' if Yannick Hanfmann advances against Tibo Colson.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If the match ends in a walkover (player withdraws before the start and the other advances automatically), this market will resolve in favor of the player(s) who officially advances to the next round.

The primary resolution source will be official information from the ATP Tour. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

This market will resolve to "Up" if the Bitcoin price at the end of the time range specified in the title is greater than or equal to the price at the beginning of that range. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Down".
The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the BTC/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/btc-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream BTC/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down - October 14, 7PM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Devils vs. Blue Jackets: O/U 5.5
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for October 13 at 7:00 PM ET:

This market will resolve to "Over" if the Devils and Blue Jackets combine to score 6 or more goals in this game.

If the combined total is less than 6, this market will resolve to "Under".

If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed. If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Devils vs. Blue Jackets
events.description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for October 13 at 3:00PM ET:
If the Devils, the market will resolve to "Devils".
If the Blue Jackets, the market will resolve to "Blue Jackets".
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
